document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Zilla River flowing through east Zakhara.
document_data.name: Al-Zilla River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Zilla River''' was the smallest of the mighty rivers that traversed the [[Cities of the Ancients]] in [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: Al-Zilla originated in the northeast region from a pair of nameless tributaries in the deep jungles near the base of the mountains forming the border with the [[Haunted Lands]].
document_data.Description: Though much smaller than the other rivers that dominated this area of [[Zakhara]], Al-Zilla adopted the same criss-crossing pattern as it made its way to the [[Foreigners' Sea]].
